name: spooky.singles (Jam Version)
description:
READ FIRST
"Matches" and "chat" don't work in this JAM VERSION
Try the full app (post jam version with all the features) at spooky.singles!

This is the jam version (#6hourspookyjam) where our character creator is the only part we had fully working.  Feel free to try it out but "Matches" and 'chat" don't work here.
